meanings.sent1: The coleopterous beetle crawled slowly across the leaf.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the coleopterous features of the beetle under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The coleopterous beetle decided to take a nap on a cozy flower petal.
meanings.sent4: Her coleopterous personality shone through in her love for collecting beetle specimens.
meanings.sent5: The coleopterous colors of the beetle's shell were mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: Having wings that meet in a straight line down the back when closed.
meanings.sent1: The coleopterous insect landed gracefully on the flower petal.
meanings.sent2: The coleopterous wings of the beetle provided protection from predators.
meanings.sent3: The coleopterous butterfly showed off its unique flying skills in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her coleopterous dance moves on the stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The coleopterous design of the airplane allowed for smooth takeoffs and landings.
